thread.title: Lena Dunham says she’s lost weight because of Trump’s presidency
thread.title_full: Lena Dunham says she’s lost weight because of Trump’s presidency - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Lena Dunham says she’s lost weight because of Trump’s presidency
text:
Lena Dunham doesn’t need a new diet plan. She has the new presidency for all her weight loss needs.
The “Girls” star revealed Monday that she’s been losing weight since Election Night over her concerns for the country.
“Donald Trump became president and I stopped being able to eat food,” Dunham told Howard Stern on his SiriusXM show.
“Everyone’s been asking like, ‘What have you been doing?’ And I’m like, ‘Try soul-crushing pain and devastation and hopelessness and you, too, will lose weight.”
Dunham was an outspoken Hillary Clinton supporter during the election season, even threatening to move to Canada if Trump won — she hasn’t followed through yet.
“Try soul-crushing pain and devastation and hopelessness and you, too, will lose weight,” Dunham said about President Trump. (NICHOLAS KAMM/AFP/Getty Images) In the aftermath, she’s continued her attack against the President, including attending the Women’s March in Washington, D.C.
Asked whether it was a mistake for Trump to be focusing so much on celebrities, Dunham complained that he had referred to her as a “B-list actor with no mojo.”
“But we’re talking about him like he’s a person who is operating in a sane way,” she told Stern. “We’re talking about him like a person who doesn’t have a personality disorder.”
